* [Mathis Gauthey](https://github.com/MathisGauthey) - for inspiration, the original repository, and for the `.js` scripts which make the project possible.

* [Alex Portell](https://github.com/portellam) - author of this fork, quality of life improvements. Experience, of over one (1) year, with this repository's template proved useful, in the development of this fork.

# Project Lead

* [Alex Portell](https://github.com/portellam)


## I would like to join this list. How can I help the project?

- [ ] Translations

For more information, please refer to our [CONTRIBUTING](CONTRIBUTING.md) guide.
